short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark scenes from your favorite TV-Shows and Movies on Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rewatchme is a Browser Extension which gives Netflix users the ability to Bookmark scenes in TV-Shows and Movies. Bookmarking makes it very easy to rewatch all your favorite scenes. Start building your collection of favorite scenes today and share them with friends to spread the joy.
